explanation: [0-0] On a green lawn, a pair of legs in blue pants and brown shoes stand on a silver tool. The tool has some brackets on top and a hexagonal slot at the bottom. In the distance are blue skies and green trees.

[0-3] Then the feet land, the silver tool is lifted, a piece of turf is loaded into the hexagonal slot of the tool, leaving a hexagonal pit on the lawn. Immediately, he steps on the tool forcefully, cutting out a hexagonal piece of turf, lifting it from the ground, and repeating twice. A Mickey Mouse head-shaped pit appears on the lawn.
